root.name: Turning Point: Fall of Liberty
root.description: OverviewTurning Point: Fall of Liberty was a poorly received first person shooter set in an alternate World-War II where Winston Churchill died before the war began, and as a result the Nazis invaded New York City, where the game takes place. Although containing an interesting premise, the gameplay and execution of the game was lackluster, resulting in a poor showing at retail, and a harsh reception from critics and gamers alike.

similar_games.game: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter
